CC: Omar Alshashaa <Omar.Alshashaa@loccitane.me>; Myrla Pascual <Myrla.Pascual@loccitane.me>; Naeem Inamdar <Naeem.Inamdar@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-14 13:57
Subject: RE: Store insurance request
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Anusha,

 

Hope you're doing well.

 

Thank you for your email. I’m redirecting your request to Hagop, who is handling insurance certificate matters for our group’s stores.

 

Dear Hagop,


Grateful if you could please share the renewed insurance certificate for L’Occitane FCC’s store at your earliest convenience, as it has been requested by the mall management.

 

Thank you both for your support.

 

Best regards,

 

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​
